name: Lost in Terra Mora
description:
You have to take on the role of one of the journalists investigating the case of your missing colleague Michael.

John and Jane, who have recently completed an investigation into the search for the missing child, go to find their colleague in a distant forest located in several states from them, in which something is clearly going wrong.

In Lost in Terra Mora:
Disturbing musical component.
Lurking traps.
Main storyline with multiple endings depending on your decisions.
3 varied levels with 3 unique monsters.
Two main characters to choose from - John, a physically developed young man, or Jane, a young and capable journalist. Possessing their own unique characteristics.
